name: APPSfactory.de
description:
Creating tomorrows digital experiences today is the mission of APPSfactory. Our unique blend of inhouse expertise in both technology and UX/UI design allows us to achieve first mover competitive advantages for our clients by implementing new technologies to improve the customer experience. APPSfactory is your partner for mobile apps, artificial intelligence and machine learning, chatbots, augmented reality, virtual reality or vertical video.
Our clients list comprises 80+ renowned brands such as e.g. Apobank, BMW, Deutsche Bahn, FAZ, Henkel, Karstadt, LBB, Lufthansa, Porsche, Samsung, Swiss Re, Tagesschau from sectors such as automotive, finance, health, insurance, transportation, kids, consumer goods.
READ MORE...
